RootTable.Filter: SELECT c.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, c.connector_type AS CLASSTYPE, 't_connector' AS CLASSTABLE, c.name, c.direction, o_src.name as source_name, c.sourcerole, o_target.name as target_name, c.destrole FROM (t_connector c INNER JOIN t_object o_src ON c.start_object_id = o_src.object_id) INNER JOIN t_object o_target ON c.end_object_id = o_target.object_id WHERE ((o_src.package_id IN (#Branch#) AND o_target.package_id IN (#Branch#) AND c.connector_type IN ('Association', 'Aggregation')) OR (o_src.package_id IN (#Branch#) AND (c.connector_type = 'Association' OR (c.connector_type = 'Aggregation' AND c.subtype = 'Weak'))) OR (o_target.package_id IN (#Branch#) AND c.connector_type = 'Aggregation' AND c.subtype = 'Strong')) AND c.Direction = 'Unspecified' ORDER BY c.name; #DB=COMMENT# Find the associations that have an unspecified direction. #DB=COMMENT#
